rooms.description: Open-plan living area integrated with kitchen; modern style featuring large windows for natural light and ventilation, Vastu compliant positioning to the east.
Modern kitchen with open design integrated into living space; equipped with smart appliances and ample countertop area.
Dining space integrated within the open-plan living area, designed to maintain a fluid transition between spaces.
Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and closet; positioned to receive optimal natural light while following Vastu principles.
Secondary bedroom with ample storage space, designed for quiet and privacy.
Additional bedroom ensuring sufficient personal space; includes built-in storage solutions.
Another private bedroom to accommodate multiple family members or guests; integrated with natural light and ventilation.
Guest room designed with modern amenities to serve as a comfortable space for visitors; includes a small private balcony.
En-suite bathroom attached to the master bedroom with full accessibility features and modern fixtures.

openings.description: Wheelchair-accessible main entrance with wide threshold and ramp leading to the living area.
Access point for the two-car garage integrated into the ground floor design; features automated door system.
Secondary entrance providing direct access to the garden and parking area, ensuring additional entry for emergency or maintenance.

rooms.description: Designated study area elevated from the main living spaces; features built-in shelving and ample natural light.
Additional storage space or utility area placed on the mezzanine level to optimize space usage.

openings.description: Staircase with a wheelchair-accessible ramp connecting the ground floor to mezzanine level.

additional_features.vastu_alignment: The apartment design follows Vastu principles with the main entrance facing north and key living spaces oriented to maximize natural light from the east.
additional_features.garage_details: Two-car garage integrated on ground floor with easy access and ample parking space.
additional_features.wheelchair_access: All levels are designed for full wheelchair accessibility including ramps, wide doorways, and accessible utilities.
